### INSTALL ###
IF(NOT WIN32)
	RETURN()
ENDIF()

IF(NOT EXISTS ${3RDPARTY}/upx-3.95-win64)
	DKSETPATH(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download)
	## https://github.com/upx/upx/releases/download/v3.95/upx-3.95-win64.zip
	DKDOWNLOAD(${DKWEB}/Download/Tools/upx-3.95-win64.zip)
	DKEXTRACT(${DIGITALKNOB}/Download/upx-3.95-win64.zip ${3RDPARTY})
ENDIF()

DKSET(UPX ${3RDPARTY}/upx-3.95-win64)
